title: Simplify Expression
text: Simplify the numerator and denominator by finding the Least Common Divisor of the fractions.

title: Rewriting
text: Rewrite as the product of the first times the reciprocal of the second.

title: Common Factors
text: We can then remove common factors after we multiply.
